statements.sql: select `permissions`.*, `model_has_permissions`.`model_id` as `pivot_model_id`, `model_has_permissions`.`permission_id` as `pivot_permission_id`, `model_has_permissions`.`model_type` as `pivot_model_type` from `permissions` inner join `model_has_permissions` on `permissions`.`id` = `model_has_permissions`.`permission_id` where `model_has_permissions`.`model_id` = 2 and `model_has_permissions`.`model_type` = 'App\Models\User'

select `roles`.*, `model_has_roles`.`model_id` as `pivot_model_id`, `model_has_roles`.`role_id` as `pivot_role_id`, `model_has_roles`.`model_type` as `pivot_model_type` from `roles` inner join `model_has_roles` on `roles`.`id` = `model_has_roles`.`role_id` where `model_has_roles`.`model_id` in (2) and `model_has_roles`.`model_type` = 'App\Models\User'
select * from `bills` where `created_by` = 2 order by `bill_id` desc limit 1

insert into `stock_reports` (`product_id`, `quantity`, `type`, `type_id`, `description`, `created_by`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('4', '1', 'bill', 3, '1  quantity purchase in bill #BILL00002', 2, '2025-10-17 19:29:30', '2025-10-17 19:29:30')
select * from `webhook_settings` where `module` = 'New Bill' and `created_by` = 2 limit 1
